vanderPol.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 !******************************************************************************
00002 ! Subroutine to Initialize, calculate the RHS, and calculate the Jacobian
00003 ! of the Kaps problem (Hairer II, pp 403)
00004 !******************************************************************************
00005 ! REQUIRED FILES:
00006 ! PRECISION_VARS.F90        *DEFINES PRECISION FOR ALL VARIABLES
00007 ! CONTROL_VARIABLES.F90     *CONTAINS VARIABLES AND ALLOCATION ROUTINES
00008 !******************************************************************************
00009       MODULE vanderPol_mod
00010       private
00011       public :: vanderPol
00012       contains
00013 
00014       subroutine vanderPol(nveclen,ep,dt,tfinal,iDT,resE_vec,resI_vec,akk)
00015 
00016       use precision_vars,    only: wp
00017       use control_variables, only: temporal_splitting,probname,xjac, &
00018      &                             tol,dt_error_tol,uvec,uexact,programstep
00019 
00020       implicit none; save
00021 !-----------------------VARIABLES----------------------------------------------
00022       integer,  parameter    :: vecl=2
00023 
00024       !INIT vars
00025       real(wp), intent(in   ) :: ep
00026       real(wp), intent(inout) :: dt
00027       integer,  intent(  out) :: nveclen
00028       real(wp), intent(  out) :: tfinal
00029       integer,  intent(in   ) :: iDT
00030 
00031       real(wp), dimension(81,vecl+1) :: ExactTot
00032       real(wp)                       :: diff
00033       integer                        :: i
00034 
00035       !RHS vars
00036       real(wp), dimension(vecl), intent(  out) :: resE_vec,resI_vec
00037       
00038       !Jacob vars
00039       real(wp), intent(in   ) :: akk
00040 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00041     
00042       Program_Step_Select: select case(programstep)
00043         !**Pre-initialization. Get problem name and vector length**
00044         case('INITIALIZE_PROBLEM_INFORMATION')
00045           nvecLen = vecl
00046           probname='vanderPol'     
00047           tol=1.0e-12_wp  
00048           dt_error_tol=5.0e-14_wp
00049         
00050         !**Initialization of problem information**        
00051         case('SET_INITIAL_CONDITIONS')
00052       
00053           ! Time information
00054           dt = 0.5_wp/10**((iDT-1)/20.0_wp) ! timestep   
00055           tfinal = 0.5_wp                   ! final time
00056           
00057           !**Exact Solution** 
00058           open(unit=39,file='exact.vanderpol.data')
00059           rewind(39)
00060           do i=1,81
00061             read(39,*)ExactTot(i,1),ExactTot(i,2)
00062             ExactTot(i,3) = 1.0_wp/10**((i-1)/(10.0_wp))  !  used for 81 values of ep
00063           enddo
00064           do i=1,81
00065             diff = abs(ExactTot(i,3) - ep)
00066             if(diff.le.1.0e-10_wp)then
00067               uexact(:) = ExactTot(i,:vecl)
00068               exit
00069             endif
00070           enddo
00071 
00072           !**IC**
00073           uvec(1) = 2.0_wp
00074           uvec(2) = -0.6666654321121172_wp
00075 !          uvec(2) = -2.0_wp/3.0_wp+10.0_wp/81.0_wp*ep-292.0_wp/2187.0_wp*ep**2 &
00076 !     &            -1814.0_wp/19683.0_wp*ep**3
00077 
00078         case('BUILD_RHS')
00079           choose_RHS_type: select case (Temporal_Splitting)
00080             case('IMEX') ! For IMEX schemes
00081               resE_vec(1) = dt*uvec(2)
00082               resE_vec(2) = 0.0_wp
00083               resI_vec(1) = 0.0_wp
00084               resI_vec(2) = dt*((1-uvec(1)*uvec(1))*uvec(2) - uvec(1))/ep
00085             case('IMPLICIT') ! For fully implicit schemes
00086               resE_vec(:) = 0.0_wp
00087               resI_vec(1) = dt*uvec(2)
00088               resI_vec(2) = dt*((1-uvec(1)*uvec(1))*uvec(2) - uvec(1))/ep
00089           end select choose_RHS_type
00090         
00091         case('BUILD_JACOBIAN')
00092           choose_Jac_type: select case(temporal_splitting)
00093             case('IMEX') ! For IMEX schemes
00094               xjac(1,1) = 1.0_wp-akk*dt*(0.0_wp)
00095               xjac(1,2) = 0.0_wp-akk*dt*(0.0_wp)
00096               xjac(2,1) = 0.0_wp-akk*dt*(-2*uvec(1)*uvec(2)-1)/ep
00097               xjac(2,2) = 1.0_wp-akk*dt*(1-uvec(1)*uvec(1))/ep
00098             case('IMPLICIT') ! For fully implicit schemes
00099               xjac(1,1) = 1.0_wp-akk*dt*(0.0_wp)
00100               xjac(1,2) = 0.0_wp-akk*dt*(1.0_wp)
00101               xjac(2,1) = 0.0_wp-akk*dt*(-2*uvec(1)*uvec(2)-1)/ep
00102               xjac(2,2) = 1.0_wp-akk*dt*(+1-uvec(1)*uvec(1))/ep
00103           end select choose_Jac_type
00104           
00105       end select Program_Step_Select
00106       end subroutine vanderPol
00107       end module vanderPol_mod
